other_tests.findings: Interictal multifocal epileptiform discharges, noticeable bilaterally in the occipital region.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 8 months, VEEG revealed extensive, multifocal epileptic discharges between seizures. At 1 year and 2 months, VEEG showed slow background activity, with no occipital-dominated rhythm and interictal multifocal epileptiform discharges. At 1 year and 6 months, VEEG displayed no occipital dominant rhythm, bilateral occipital spikes, and slow waves, with no seizures detected.

other_tests.findings: Blurred T1 high signal in the hindlimb of the internal capsule, a lack of white matter, and a high T2 signal.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 6 months, brain MRI showed deep sulci, delayed myelination, little white matter, and thin corpus callosum.

other_tests.procedure_name: Whole-exome sequencing, copy number variation, and mitochondrial gene testing
other_tests.findings: No pathogenic variants found that were extremely consistent with the phenotype.

other_tests.procedure_name: Trio sequencing using whole-exon next-generation sequencing (NGS)
other_tests.findings: Compound heterozygous variant of the ACTL6B gene: a heterozygous deletion of exons 1-4 inherited from the father, and a c.1017 + 3G > T mutation in the intron region inherited from the mother.
